name: fetchamatch
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool cleardil.
Tool description: The End-to-End KYC compliance solution An integrated platform to effortlessly meet all your Anti-Money Laundering and KYC requirements - on the back of a modern Web Portal and a developer-friendly API.
API description: Fetches match details from the specified screening and customer IDs using the provided API credentials.

content_type.description: The content type for the request.

customer_a_id.description: The customer ID for whom the match is being fetched.

match_1_id.description: The ID of the match to fetch details for.

screening_a_id.description: The ID of the screening in which the match was found.
